scripts.integration:all: pnpm run integration:unchanged && pnpm run integration:degradation
scripts.integration:npm: perftool -o test-result/old.json --logLevel=verbose && SLOW=1 perftool -o test-result/new.json --logLevel=verbose && npm run integration:compare
scripts.integration:degradation: perftool -o test-result/old.json --logLevel=verbose && SLOW=1 perftool -o test-result/new.json --logLevel=verbose && pnpm run integration:compare -o test-result/degradation.json
scripts.integration:unchanged: perftool -o test-result/old.json --logLevel=verbose && perftool -o test-result/new.json --logLevel=verbose && pnpm run integration:compare -o test-result/unchanged.json
